name: GD AutoBot
description: Automatic level completion bot with physics simulation

sim-frames.name: Simulation Frames
sim-frames.description: How many frames ahead to simulate (higher = smarter but slower)

hold-duration.name: Click Hold Duration
hold-duration.description: How many frames to hold each click

hitbox-scale.name: Hitbox Scale
hitbox-scale.description: Player hitbox multiplier (lower = more precise, higher = safer)

safe-margin.name: Safe Margin
safe-margin.description: Extra pixels to avoid hazards by

reaction-distance.name: Reaction Distance
reaction-distance.description: How far ahead to check for hazards

debug-overlay.name: Show Debug Overlay
debug-overlay.description: Show position and status info on screen

debug-draw.name: Show Trajectory Lines
debug-draw.description: Draw predicted paths and hazard hitboxes
